definition: (Christianity) the doctrine of the ecumenical movement that promotes cooperation and better understanding among different religious denominations: aimed at universal Christian unity
details:
noun
- (Christianity) the doctrine of the ecumenical movement that promotes cooperation and better understanding among different religious denominations: aimed at universal Christian unity
= synonyms: ecumenicism, ecumenicalism
- a movement promoting union between religions (especially between Christian churches)
= synonyms: oecumenism
